title: Rocket League Sideswipe for Android & iOS adds new Volleyball mode, casual matches in Season 2
content:
Following its debut late last year, Rocket League Sideswipe, the mobile port of the hit PC/console game, is preparing for Season 2. The coming update will bring more ways to play Rocket League Sideswipe, including a special Volleyball mode.

more…

The post Rocket League Sideswipe for Android & iOS adds new Volleyball mode, casual matches in Season 2 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Rocket League Sideswipe is rolling out support for an official Volleyball mode as a part of its Season 2, which starts in February.
